ygData.msgSnippet: Hello NEAT Community. I have a project in Mono/C# of physical animation and I want a Neural Network to drive my behaviours. I am really seduced by the NEAT

Hello NEAT Community.

I have a project in Mono/C# of physical animation an=
d I want a Neural Network to drive my behaviours.
I am really seduced by th=
e NEAT concept, but unfortunately I can't find a way to use it in Unity3d w=
hich is my 3D Environment/Framework.

Does anyone have experienced into com=
bining the two frameworks ?

PS:
I have tried SharpNEAT, which is Mono-Comp=
atible, but it appears that Unity wrapped a modified version of Mono, and l=
acks of (for example) System.Threading.Tasks ... so SharpNEAT could not run=
 without it.
